name: Lunatics Demo
description:
Lunatics is a dark comedy RPG with a rough but fitting visual style and unique assets about a group of mutants and supernaturally altered losers that begin with one goal in mind: finding a safe haven in the wasteland. On the journey, they are accosted by all manner of bandits, gangs, and extortionists trying to rob what little you have.

Join our discord to talk about the game here!
https://discord.gg/3uhegJy
